doctor.name: Dr. A.S.M Rowshon Newaz
doctor.workplace: Shaheed M. Monsur Ali Medical College, Sirajganj
doctor.info: Dr. A.S.M Rowshon Newaz is a Skin Specialist in Pabna. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MPhil (Physio), PGT (Skin & Sex). He is a Associate Professor & Head, Dermatology at Shaheed M. Monsur Ali Medical College, Sirajganj. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Shafique Hospital, Pabna. Practicing hour of Dr. A.S.M Rowshon Newaz at Shafique Hospital, Pabna is 4pm to 9pm (Thursday & Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Akhterul Alam Azad
doctor.specialty: Dermatology (Skin, Allergy, Leprosy, Hair) & Sexual Medicine Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Akhterul Alam Azad is a Dermatologist in Pabna. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), DDV (BSMMU), DMU, CCD (BIRDEM). He is a Assistant Professor, Dermatology & Venerology at Pabna Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Jalal Memorial Hospital, Pabna. Practicing hour of Dr. Akhterul Alam Azad at Jalal Memorial Hospital, Pabna is 3pm to 8pm (Sunday & Tuesday).
